Text:
Is anyone else getting the program automatically close by itself after ripping a movie or show? This sucks it happens everytime!! I uninstalled and reinstalled and same thing.. anyone can confirm this or is it just me?

Win7, home prem,4GB ram, 2.6ghz cpu, 700GBhdd

lif3isfr33
This is also happening to me :/
Win 7 x64bit
It just keeps crashing like others said.

This program shuts down before it finishes ripping. It closes around the 98% mark. I am guessing it can tell you're running a pirate copy and doesn't let you finish ripping? I am not blaming the uploader of course, thanks always.
